title: Bug 6536: Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing
description: When trying to add Javadoc on a field in the TH (Table Header) using the context menu, the action does not have any effect. As a result, the Javadoc for the field is not added.
OB: When selecting the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu on a field in the TH, nothing happens. The Javadoc for the field is not added.
EB: When selecting the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu on a field in the TH, the Javadoc for the field should be added.
SR:
1. Open the TH in the application.
2. Right-click on a field in the TH.
3. From the context menu, select 'Add Javadoc'.
4. Verify that the Javadoc for the field is added successfully.
